catalog_script_client.name: Style for IP Assign

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_228df8ca87c88654e94ca8ec0ebb35f7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="IP Address Request">d942ac5e87f37d90e94ca8ec0ebb352e</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Style for IP Assign</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad(){
	setTimeout(function(){ 
		if(window != null){
			// native
			g_form.getControl('u_ref_assignedip').setAttribute('style', 'display:none');
		}
		else{
			// portal
			var aTags = this.document.getElementsByClassName("ng-binding");
			var searchText = "Assigned IP";
			var found;

			for (var i = 0; i < aTags.length; i++) {
				if (aTags[i].textContent.toString() == searchText) {
					aTags[i].style.display = 'none';
					break;
				}
			}
		}

	}, 3000);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chris.layman@infocenter.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-31 14:06:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>228df8ca87c88654e94ca8ec0ebb35f7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Style for IP Assign</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="inSubnet" source="x_8302_insubnet">80d913ffdb231010f9282737489619ea</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="inSubnet">80d913ffdb231010f9282737489619ea</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_228df8ca87c88654e94ca8ec0ebb35f7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chris.layman@infocenter.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-31 14:07:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
